mcq.statement: Correct sequence of the four elements of a neural pathway in simple-reflex circuit?

options.a: Sensory neuron → associative neuron → motor neuron → muscles
options.b: Muscles → sensory neuron → associative neuron → motor neuron
options.c: Motor neurons → associate neuron → Sensory neuron → muscles
options.d: Associate neuron → sensory neuron → motor neuron → muscles
